body.name: Organic Baby Eczema Relief by Irene Organics - Natural Moisturizing Balm for Dry, Irritated Skin and Eczema Treatment, Gentle for Kids, Babies and Adults
body.stockDetail: Only 2 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 21 hrs 37 mins
features: RELIEF FOR YOUR BABY'S ECZEMA - Our naturally formulated Eczema Relief Balm helps to moisturize and prevent your baby’s sensitive skin from getting dry, itchy and irritated because we believe nothing is more important than giving your baby a happy healthy skin!

ALL NATURAL & ORGANIC INGREDIENTS - We have combined the best natural ingredients to remedy and ease itchiness, redness and dryness caused by Eczema. Rich in vitamins and gentle on baby’s skin, the Grapeseed and Coconut oil is perfect in moisturizing delicate and sensitive skin. Blended with Chamomile and Lavender Essential Oils ensures to reduce inflammation and skin infections. Proven to have no artificial fragrances, preservatives or toxins!

PARENT & BABY AWARD WINNER 2022 - Irene Organics is a women-owned small business that won Best Baby Skincare Brand in the Northeast, USA. When you support Irene Organics, not only are you making the cleanest, most natural choice for you and your baby, but you are also supporting a mom-owned business and helping Irene spread the message that natural, toxin-free, preservative-free products is what every parent and child deserve!

ECO-FRIENDLY & USA HANDMADE - Made with love in small batches and packaged in a a glass amber jar to also avoid the need for any preservatives and avoid chemicals from plastics that may seep into your balm. Plus, we care about the environment!
DIAPER BAG ESSENTIAL - Throw it in your diaper bag or keep it in your diaper caddy to use daily as an eczema preventative!

productInformation.value: #26,926 in Handmade Products (See Top 100 in Handmade Products) #12 in Handmade Baby Health, Bathing & Skin Care #1,181 in Handmade Beauty & Personal Care Products

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Voted Best Postpartum & Baby Skincare Company in 2022! Hand-crafted mommy and baby skincare with all natural and organic ingredients that are effective.

Irene Organics Baby Skincare Line - NEW! Baby Oatmeal Bath Treatment Powder A gentle powder that can be used in a warm bath to help soothe and relieve eczema, dry skin, sunburns, rashes or minor skin irritations. Ingredients: Colloidal Oatmeal Powder, Marshmallow Root Powder, Calendula Powder, Chamomile Powder Baby Oil (4 fl oz) A gentle, lightweight, fast absorbing oil with just 3 ingredients that hydrates your baby's skin without leaving them feeling greasy or sticky. Also gentle enough to be used on cradle cap. Ingredients: Grapeseed Oil, Jojoba Oil, Calendula Oil Diaper Rash Relief Balm (4 oz) Formulated with natural ingredients to help relieve diaper rash and prevent diaper rash in a simple way. Ingredients: Grapeseed Oil, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Beeswax, Zinc Oxide, Calendula Oil, Lavender Essential Oil Baby Balm (4oz) Formulated with natural ingredients to help hydrate and relieve dry skin and itchiness. Ingredients: Grapeseed Oil, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Beeswax, Calendula Oil, Lavender Essential Oil, Chamomile Essential Oil

Made with natural, rich ingredients Grapeseed Oil Formulated with natural oils that are high in Vitamin E and essential fatty omega acids to increase elasticity, moisturize, hydrate and absorb quickly into the skin leaving it supple and silky smooth. Chamomile Extract Chamomile oil can help calm skin inflammation and redness, making it a useful natural remedy for conditions, such as acne, dry skin and eczema. Calendula Extract Calendula oil has properties that make it useful in healing wounds, soothing eczema, and relieving itching associated with dry skin, eczema and rashes.

Irene Organics Backstory How Irene Organics was Created? Irene has never considered how the products everyone takes for granted aren't as clean as we think until her mother was diagnosed with breast cancer at just 28 years old. With environmental factors as the cause, she started to educate herself on the foods that we eat and the everyday products that we use that can affect our health. It was a path down a very long road that would lead her to found Irene Organics some years later. "Before starting Irene Organics Skincare I was a professional nanny for over 10 years and then later became a Certified Pediatric Sleep Consultant so I had a lot of experience working with parents and babies. I also had a passion for making my own natural, homemade skincare products and realized that the children I cared for responded well to my natural DIY products in comparison to larger store brand products" - Irene 2020 saw Irene expecting her first child, and with this detailed knowledge of the industry behind her, she wanted to create a product that would be entirely safe for her, and for other moms to use. "That's when I created my Pregnancy & Postpartum Mama line, to help mothers like me keep their skin feeling and looking good in a natural way without any harm to them or their little ones. In 2021 my son was born and I knew I needed to get working on my Baby Skincare line as well." Irene explained. In 2022 Irene Organics won the Parent & Baby Award for Best Postpartum & Baby Skincare Brand in the Northeast - USA. Now, in 2023 Irene is also expecting her second son. When you support Irene Organics, not only are you making the cleanest, most natural choice for you and your baby, but you are also supporting a small women-owned, mom-owned business and helping Irene spread the message that natural, toxin-free, preservative-free products is what every parent and child deserve.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works better than I expected. A little goes a long way. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The product has no seal outside or inside, just the lid! No plastic cover on the outside or any covering when I opened the lid. The paper/plastic inside says "sealed for your protection" but it's not. It was stuck together with the lid when I first opened it. The product seems great, all natural and has a very mild scent though. Hope it works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately, this didn’t work as well as I was hoping. It seems to be pretty greasy. It was absorbed decently well with my sons skin, but it did not seem to help with his eczema at all. Bummer. The glass jar is really nice though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent moisturizing balm!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this because my daughter gets eczema around her mouth every time she eats something with corn or gluten in it. I also have some rough patches on my foot and I’m not quite sure if it's eczema but I wanted to try this balm out on it. The balm is quite greasy which my 10 year old wasn’t fond of but it does work well! I have been putting it on my rough patches on my foot and the skin is much improved. My kids’ hands have been very chapped and I have been putting this on them daily as well as on my own hands. They are so much better. Overall I really like this product and will purchase it again. This product is not going to cure eczema because you have to treat the root cause (typically some type of intolerance to food or body product) but it is really great at getting rid of it when you have a flare up.see pictures posted. This is a quality product and I give it a 5-star rating!I hope you found this review Helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked well on baby's irritated cheeks
reviews.reviewText: I gave this product to my niece for her 5 month old baby whose cheeks get red and irritated. The product worked well to soothe the the redness without irritation or scent that irritated. Recommend for baby's sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin and eczema!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been suffering from dermatitis/eczema and it’s worst on my hairline and on/behind my ears. My doctor recommend Aveeno Eczema relief for babies, and while it makes my skin soft right after I showed/wash my face, within a few hours my skin begins to flake again.I gave this product a shot and I’m liking it so far! It does feel a little oily, BUT it’s a whole heck of a lot lighter than coconut oil moisturizer (which is what I was using before getting this balm) and it doesn’t sting my ears when I apply it.If you’re using Aveeno or CeraVe eczema relief, this is a great step up! It does smell a bit like Aveeno, so it has some kind of neutral “plain” scent with a hint of oatmeal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Arrived Shattered With Glass Throughout
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately, I am unable to review this cream on its own merits, as it arrived in a glass jar that was completely shattered. There were glass shards all throughout the cream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Natual, clean scent relief
reviews.reviewText: Very nice balm for eczema relief!Good size container will last a while.The product is light, not greasy, but moisturizes well. Very light fragrance from the natural ingredients; barely noticeable and doesn't interfere with other fragrances.All ingredients are organice and very helpful at healing and quickly clearing up an eczema outbreak!No waste: the balm is great for dry skin, in general. After applying balm on eczema patch, I rub the rest into my hands! :)Thanks for a great product Irene Organics! I'll be back for more...
